one_reviews_text: This is very good representation of busd. Very accurate and dispicilble. This is what happens when you sleepo on public bus at 3:00 AM. Would recommend. I miss my grand children.
This is the most beutiful game ive ever played, ending brought a tear to my eye. absolutley stunning

Scariest "game" I've ever played. I wish I was joking. Most horror games dont scare me. This one on the other hand, was terrifying. I have extremely bad social anxiety and this is basically a horror game that preys on that. It would probably at least mildly unnerve anyone but it's a thousand times worse than you already have social anxiety. Bravo to the devs.
I can't decide whether I like this or loathe it.  It's bizarre and unsettling yet artistically interesting enough to watch through to the end.

I see free, and I see a 4+ rating I download.  I get what I pay for.  This was interesting.  I can see what the creators were trying to do and it got weird, which I think was the point but it also didn't leave me with anything.  It was a bit longer than I thought it should have been and they could have amped it up imho.

I'm giving it a 1 just because I don't think this thing deserves the total over all rating it currently has.  I'd give it a 3.5 though for being free and an experience.  Not a 4.

Basic graphics, but so freaky (in a good way. I started giggling on day three for some reason. My 10 year old daughter was a bit disturbed by it - but she did like some of her fellow travellers. Hey - it's free - what have you got to lose?
Wow Truly an amazing experince. Its fun, charming and plain relaxing! For sure the most innovatove VR experience yet! A MUST PLAY!

review_title: I feel I like missed something
one_reviews_text:
I don't see what everyone is saying about this. 
It's certainly not bad, its competent but I just don't see what everyone else sees in this experience.
I got this game thinking this was a game for sleeping BOY WAS I WRONG as soon as I saw the part where the baby was peeking from the driver sweet I almost peed. If you want some scary ness Play now!

review_title: Lol that was not what I expected.
one_reviews_text:
I bought awhile ago and never got around to playing. For got it was an experience not a game, totally caught me off guard. A pretty fun random as experience to show people, I also like some of interations. 

My interpretation of it is showing us how uncofortable it is to be stared at even though we spend so much time staring at others.

So why the 5 Stars? Well, because it's weird, that's why. When was the last time you've actually downloaded an irrevelant, pointless and especially weird VR experience for rift? OK, it's not LSD weird, it's more like... imagine a third-grader with a very rudimentary art program for his Caleco video game console. Yes, the one with the cartridge you insert into the top of the machine. Now imagine what kind of "art" the kid would produce using said 1980's era gaming machine. Now imagine taking the kid's art and *poof!* Converting all of it into a 3-D experience for the Oculus Rift. Oh, and the kid just happened to create a masterrpiece involving five day's worth of road trips via the metropolitan public transit system.
     If you can imagine all that, then you now have a very good understanding of what to expect with this weird Bus Simulator 'game.'
Even thoe I dont know what I just played I enjoyed it a little it was fun and weird at the same time, if you like weird stuff play this!

review_title: Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds - bus ride
one_reviews_text: Every wondered what it would feel like to take public transportation while tripping on acid? Well, now you can through the magic of VR!
for those who love random vr experriences...heres another. its short, simple and makes no sense, reminded me of myself

Do you remember the '60's?  Probably not. Take a bus ride like you never have before.  This experience is life altering.  Not for children. A naked guy falls for you (I think). Just don't stare.
Get it while you can. Before they make this illegal. Like wow, man.
That must be socially critical. I do not understand it. Is it just crazy or is there a deeper meaning behind it?

review_title: Living in a small village not a city
one_reviews_text:
Living in a small village not a city, we all great each other
Once we step outside to a town or city people act differently, as in the bus : )
WHY IS THAT ?
God Bless

Different.  
Headset in this AND only THIS app,  Gos BLACK after a fiew mins.  !!!

Only get HMD View back with Reload-Oculus-Drivers or RE-Boot.
GFX W9100, Rizen 7, Win 10.
very interesting game, honestly fun randomness that made my day.
You have to try it, and i would love to see more things like this!
That must be socially critical. I do not understand it. Is it just crazy or is there a deeper meaning behind it?
